responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Command injection in run_cljs_bg.sh
    analysis: |
      The `run_cljs_bg.sh` script uses the output of `node out/main.js` as part of a shell redirection without any sanitization. 
      An attacker who can control the output of `node out/main.js` can inject arbitrary commands that will be executed by the shell. 
      This could lead to remote code execution on the server.
    cwe: CWE-78
    function_names: []
    filenames:
      - bin/run_cljs_bg.sh
    classification: very promising
```

leads.headline: Command injection in run_cljs_bg.sh
leads.analysis:
The run_cljs_bg.sh script uses the output of node out/main.js as part of a shell redirection without any sanitization. 
An attacker who can control the output of node out/main.js can inject arbitrary commands that will be executed by the shell. 
This could lead to remote code execution on the server.
